name: places/ChIJf8bQlF5YwokRcwKAgY-7KY0

displayName.text: PS/IS 191 - The Riverside School for Makers and Artists

formattedAddress: 300 W 61st St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 300 W 61st St, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text:
This is one of the worst schools you can go. No homework No hard tests AND CONSTENT BULLYING. I've seen fights happen right behind me while the teachers didn't do anything. Its crazy how not scary the teachers are, they don't use anything in their power to make students stop talking OR do work. Also students are bringing drugs and using them in school, And while all this happens the school principal doesn't do anything at all not even calling parents. And because of all this its Impossible to have a normal conversion with a student from this school. The teachers don't help but make fun of you. This is one of the worst school experiences i had.

Update: Now I'm smelling vape coming inside of my classroom and weed on rooftop, AND the principal loves lying to parents while the parents teach no discipline to their own kids.

originalText.text:
If your child is a good student, do not enroll him in this school.
Their behavior and education will radically deteriorate. The principal of the school is the worst, this school  have bad Children bringing drugs to school, search other children's backpacks and steal. and no one does anything about it, much less the principal.
I do not recommend this school at all.

originalText.text: The middle school education in this school is terrible. No homework, Drug use, Plus constant bullying and violent fighting. Apparently police have shown up more than two times in the past year. Don’t send your child here.

text.text: The middle school education in this school is terrible. No homework, Drug use, Plus constant bullying and violent fighting. Apparently police have shown up more than two times in the past year. Don’t send your child here.

originalText.text: This school is the worst. My stepson is constantly getting bullied. There was an incident where another child threw a book at my stepson's head and when he told the teacher she simply told him to "ignore him." IGNORE? When my stepson was battered and bullied? DO NOT SEND YOUR CHILD TO SCHOOL HERE. THE TEACHERS AND ADMINISTRATORS DO. NOT. CARE.

originalText.text: Worst school ever if your son is a student, do not bring them here, he will start to do drugs, thinks swearing is cool, thinks saying the n word is cool he even told me to f off when I told him it's time to eat he told me he's been bullied, he's been he's been in fights for no reason he told me people at the school or vaping and doing cigarettes while people are not watching, they even have their phones out during class in the constant bullying, there there's always something happening, really bad
